rules_text:
The March of Death deals 1 damage to any target. You gain 1 life. Then if you’ve cast thirteen or more spells named The March of Death this game, a player of your choice loses the game.
Flashback {1}{B} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)[/i]
{1}{B}: Put this card from exile into your hand.
